Get a string of both translation and rotation

Parameters:

Returns:

getRadius

public static double getRadius(int level)
Get the radius for a sharing level. This does not exactly correspond to the sharing level. The outermost ring is a colorful marker. The radius for inner circle is not retrieved through this.

Parameters:
level - the sharing level
Returns:
the radius of the circle

getSharingLevel

public static int getSharingLevel(double radius)
Get the sharing level for a radius

Parameters:
radius - the input radius. The larger the radius, the lower the sharing level.
Returns:
the shairing level that the radius falls into
